mapper.update: update base_resource_authority set keyid=keyid ,ugroupid=#{ugroupid} ,authoritytype=#{authoritytype} ,resourceid=#{resourceid} ,resourcetype=#{resourcetype} ,parentid=#{parentid} ,path=#{path} ,description=#{description} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where keyid=#{keyid}

update base_resource_authority set keyid=keyid ,ugroupid=#{ugroupid} ,authoritytype=#{authoritytype} ,resourceid=#{resourceid} ,resourcetype=#{resourcetype} ,parentid=#{parentid} ,path=#{path} ,description=#{description} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and ugroupid=#{Where_ugroupid} and authoritytype=#{Where_authoritytype} and resourceid=#{Where_resourceid} and resourcetype=#{Where_resourcetype} and parentid=#{Where_parentid} and path=#{Where_path} and description=#{Where_description} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.authoritytype "authoritytype", t.resourceid "resourceid", t.resourcetype "resourcetype", t.parentid "parentid", t.path "path", t.description "description", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from base_resource_authority t where keyid=#{keyid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.authoritytype "authoritytype", t.resourceid "resourceid", t.resourcetype "resourcetype", t.parentid "parentid", t.path "path", t.description "description", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from base_resource_authority t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.authoritytype=#{authoritytype} and t.resourceid=#{resourceid} and t.resourcetype=#{resourcetype} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.path=#{path} and t.description=#{description} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.authoritytype "authoritytype", t.resourceid "resourceid", t.resourcetype "resourcetype", t.parentid "parentid", t.path "path", t.description "description", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from base_resource_authority t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.authoritytype=#{authoritytype} and t.resourceid=#{resourceid} and t.resourcetype=#{resourcetype} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.path=#{path} and t.description=#{description} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}
mapper.delete: delete from base_resource_authority where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and ugroupid=#{Where_ugroupid} and authoritytype=#{Where_authoritytype} and resourceid=#{Where_resourceid} and resourcetype=#{Where_resourcetype} and resourcetype!=#{Where_resourcetype_no} and parentid=#{Where_parentid} and path=#{Where_path} and description=#{Where_description} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.authoritytype "authoritytype", t.resourceid "resourceid", t.resourcetype "resourcetype", t.parentid "parentid", t.path "path", t.description "description", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from base_resource_authority t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.authoritytype=#{authoritytype} and t.resourceid=#{resourceid} and t.resourcetype=#{resourcetype} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.path=#{path} and t.description=#{description} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}

select count(*) from base_resource_authority t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.keyid!=#{NoId} and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.authoritytype=#{authoritytype} and t.resourceid=#{resourceid} and t.resourcetype=#{resourcetype} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.path=#{path} and t.description=#{description} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}
